results.title: Anti-Hypertensive Drugs Have Different Effects on Ventricular Hypertrophy Regression
results.text_hl: Indapamina (diuretic) had a stronger effect than @CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@enalapril@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Losartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019808 @@@losartan@@@ (angiotensin II receptor type 1 (AT1) receptor antagonist) produced better results than @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ (selective beta1 receptor antagonist) with respect to @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy_Left_Ventricular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017379 @@@LVH@@@ regression.

results.title: [The regression of left ventricular hypertrophy following a short antihypertensive treatment].
results.text_hl: With the objective of trying to prove the regression of ventricular mass in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Essential_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D000075222 @@@essential hypertension@@@, with and without @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy_Left_Ventricular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017379 @@@left ventricular hypertrophy@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy_Left_Ventricular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017379 @@@LVH@@@), we studied 42 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ of both sexes with echocardiography, measuring the left ventricular mass (LVM), the mean parietal thickness (MPT) and the relative parietal thickness (RPT), before and after one month of random treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, @CHEMICAL_Verapamil @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014700 @@@verapamil@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Xipamide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014988 @@@xipamide@@@, independently that the blood pressure control was or not satisfactory.

citations.NLM: Soria F, Alegría E, Valdés M, García A, Vicente T, Apellaniz G. [The regression of left ventricular hypertrophy following a short antihypertensive treatment]. Rev Esp Cardiol. 1991 Jun-Jul;44(6):389-94. PMID: 1833800
citations.BibTeX: @article{1833800, title={[The regression of left ventricular hypertrophy following a short antihypertensive treatment].}, author={Soria F and Alegría E and Valdés M and García A and Vicente T and Apellaniz G}, journal={Rev Esp Cardiol}, volume={44}, number={6}, pages={389-94}}

results.title: [Treatment of hypertension in patients with left ventricular hypertrophy].
results.text_hl: INTERPRETATION: @CHEMICAL_Losartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019808 @@@Losartan@@@ prevented more @DISEASE_Cardiovascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D002318 @@@cardiovascular complications@@@ than @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ for the same reduction in blood pressure and have positive additional effects beyond blood pressure control in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy_Left_Ventricular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017379 @@@left ventricular hypertrophy@@@.
